titleStmt.title: [The sea-mans leave taken of his] sweetest Margerie, and Margery her singing loath to depart, being very unwilling to leave her sweet-heart. To the tune of, Ile goe through the world with thee.

publicationStmt.publisher: by J.H. for Francis Coles, Dwelling in the Old-Bailey,

notesStmt.note: Portion of title and date of publication suggested by Wing.
Verse: "Sweet Margery I am prest to the sea ..."
A variant of Wing S2188E? Cf. Wing (CD-ROM, 1996).
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
